tracks.text: Funimation
Suburbs. April 3, 9:27 am, Fey & Company Law Offices
A man in a dark room listens to earbuds. He has purple hair, wears gold rings on every finger, and drinks red wine. His smile sparkles.

Sunlight breaks over the skyscrapers. Window panes cast shadows over chairs, a witness stand, a gavel, the courtroom. The shadows move as the sun rises until it reaches above the judge's seat, where the scales of justice emblazen a golden seal. The sun's reflection fills our view with light. Blue on black text Japanese appears. Ace Attorney. The world you see

Phoenix Wright, wearing a blue suit, white shirt, and red tie runs along the sidewalk, a city in backdrop. Wright is an otherwise average man with slicked back hair that makes him look like he's going fast.
Wright stumbles and almost trips. There are children's chalk drawings on the sidewalk, and he carefully avoids stepping on them. Once clear, he turns back and smiles.

Mia Fey wears a yellow teardrop pendant. She has long black hair, wears a white robe down to her mid thigh, red ribbon, and purple haori jacket. She prays in a small room surrounded by candles. She turns around and a smoky aura surrounds her. A blue teardrop stone falls and shatters.
Rain soaks Wright as he stands face up, eyes closed, dark clouds covering the skyscrapers behind him. He faces forward, balls his fists, and starts to run.
A man in a red suit walks along the beach, waves lapping at his footprints. The man turns around to see Wright standing behind him.
Wright pants, steels his gaze, then raises his hand, shackled by a glowing golden chain. The man in the red suit looks down at the gold chain on his wrist, and yanks it, yelling.

The 2 hold the sides of the gold chain taught. Red and blue pillars of light shoot the 2 into the air, standing on either side of a golden rod. We spin around the 2 men as they scream. They arrive at the 2 arms of the scales of justice, and explode in fireworks of red and blue.
The scales explode into light and erupt across a field, leaving sparkling sunflowers in its wake.
The sunflowers replace the suburbs.
Wright runs past sunflowers. Maya Fey, Larry Butz, and a scruffy middle aged man run after him.
Mia Faye walks by in black and white heels, a black suit jacket and miniskirt, low-cut white bouse, and yellow scarf
Wright stops running and turns to look at her. Mia looks at him. She wears a blue teardrop pendant.
He nods, slaps a table in front of him, explodes in a blue nebula, points forward and shouts. On the other side of a courtroom, the man points, shouts, and explodes in a red nebula.
Mount Fuji peaks between skyscrapers. Phoenix Wright points at us.
Turnabout Sisters - 1st Trial
In an office, Wright holds an envelope, smiles, and salutes Mia. In a courtroom, a man gestures.
The prosecutor points.
Newspaper headline, "Genius Prosecutor Wins Again! Dark Rumors follow victory". Wright reads a small article titled "Rookie Attorney Takes Plaudits", featuring his picture.
A city at night
His watch reads 9:03. He runs towards down the sidewalk.
An elevator opens. April 3, 9:08 PM.
Wright approaches the door.
He walks past a receptionist desk, towards a door partially ajar.
He sees glass at his feet.
His eyes widen, then focuses forward. Scattered on the floor are books, papers, and a cup.
He steps around a couch and sees Mia, on the floor, sitting against the wall, eyes closed.
He crawls to her
A girl cowers in the corner, tears in her eyes.
She shakes her head.
A scruffy man brandishes handcuffs.
Gumshoe puts on a white glove. A suited man points to a piece of paper.
Red text is smeared on the back.
Keep Out signs stretch across the front door.
Maya Faye and Phoenix Wright get into a police car.
Suburbs in the morning. Wright sits in his room with messy hair.
Wright adjusts his hair in the mirror. The TV shows A1N News, Beautiful Attorney Murdered, Mia Fey, 27.
Wright slams his fist on the table. Maya cries in a jail cell.
Flashbacks to Mia's body.
Wright bikes across a bridge.
April 4, 9:07 AM. Detention Center, Visitor's Room.
Wright adjusts his tie. Maya approaches from the other side of the glass. She wears Geta sandals, a yukata robe, an obi sash, and a haori jacket.
She blushes slightly.
A flashback to Larry Butz handing the Thinker to Mia.
She looks to the side.
April 4, Grossberg Law Offices. A large, classy, corporate building.
Wright bows and leaves the office.
The purple haired man talks on the phone.
His smile sparkles. At night, Wright places a plastic bag on a table.
Wright lies back in bed.
Wright looks at the ceiling and touches his medallion.
A gold circle stained glass window shines in a cathedral at night.
A door sign reads, 1202, Miles Edgeworth.
Edgeworth stares out a window at the city. He holds a red and gold teacup. He wears a red suit with a white ascot.
A trophy with a K lies on the couch. A silver statue of a smaurai and a vase of flowers sit on a table.
Edgeworth turns to his desk. The room also contains a red and white chess board, with 1 white and 4 red pieces.
He picks up a paper. It includes a picture of Miya Faye and reads, estimated time of death: April 3, after 8 pm. Cause of death: blunt force trauma to the head.
At the Faye office, Wright opens the door and walks in.
In a flashback, Mia pours water into a bamboo plant.
In the present, he frowns.
A red phone strap dangles from the bamboo plant.
Detective Gumshoe walks into the office.
Edgeworth slaps a table.
Wright salutes.
The Bando Hotel
He knocks on room 303.
The door is ajar.
The hotel room has 2 queen beds. A table with pairs of chairs and wineglasses sit next to a window. Wright looks out the hotel window, and sees Gumshoe in the Fey office.
Gumshoe yells at a subordinate, who salutes. Wright looks down at the table, and sees colored pens and frilly hair ornament.
He drops it. He picks it up and finds a diamond ring.
He trips over a trash can.
The bathroom door opens and a woman's bare leg gestures.
He replaces the trash, and notices a small device with an antenna and 2 cables.
He runs out and closes the door behind him.
He passes a steward carrying a wine bottle in an ice bucket. Wright shimmies by.
He catches his breath in an alley, then pulls the device out of his pocket.
Grossberg seats the phone, claps his hands, and looks down. Rain patters on a river as cherry blossoms fall.
Wright pushes his bike through the rain.
He looks up.
In a flashback, rain drips in an urban alleyway.
Young Wright stands under a shop awning.
An elementary school girl walks by, carrying an umbrella. She doesn't look at him.
Wright looks up. The umbrella comes into view. He looks forward, and the girl reaches out the umbrella, smiling.
The 2 walk down the sidewalk.
Wright cries in a classroom while dozens of kids point at him.
Including the girl who had the umbrella.
In present day, rain runs down Wright's face.
Maya sleeps in a jail cell.
Wright climbs on his bike and pedals away.
Dripping from the rain, Wright stands across a window from Maya and bows.
Her eyes widen. His notebook is filled with a hundred names. 2 are circled, the rest are crossed out.
One of the circled names is Kyle Rivers Law Offices.
He turns around. His shoulders are speckled with cherry blossom pedals, stuck to his wet jacket.
A cherry blossom drops from his jacket to the table at the window.
Maya stands.
They stare at each other.
A tear runs down Maya's cheek.
Wet cherry blossoms glimmer in sunlight. Raindrops fall from a pedal. Pedals land on a still river as the sun comes out.
Maya takes a step forward.
They stare at each other, mouths open.
They both bow, and hit their heads on the window. They hold their foreheads.
The city
A car drives down a highway.
Miles Edgeworth sits in the driver seat.
Wright stares at the sky. A cherry blossom passes by.
Wright bikes along the rivers edge.
People gather in front of the Courthouse. Edgeworth drifts his car 180 degrees, stopping in front of the crowd.
Police open the door for Edgeworth and salute him.
Wright parks his bike in a mostly empty bike shed.
Prosecutor: Miles Edgeworth. Defense Attorney: Phoenix Wright.
April 6, 9:10 AM. District Court, Courtroom Number 1.
The doors fly open. Miles Edgeworth steps forward.
Edgeworth looks up, towards the front of the courtroom. Wright tenses his fist.
Edgeworth looks at the massive scales of justice, sitting above the judge.
He bows in a Western style.
Credits roll
